description: Materialize data from a Dynamic Mosiac

inputPortDescriptors.description: The AOI (in geojson) of the data to materialize
inputPortDescriptors.name: aoi_geojson
output_filename
inputPortDescriptors.description: Filename of the output tif.  Default is dynamic.tif

inputPortDescriptors.name: version
inputPortDescriptors.description: Version of the dynamic mosiac to use.  Default is latest

name: dynamic_materializer
